resources.string: Hello from the Mobile Innovation Lab!
No app found to open the url
If you like our app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks!
Please allow this app to get your location information.
Please check if your GPS is enabled, if not, please set it on high accuracy from location settings.
Give this app permission to check your location.
Please allow this app to know your location for better overall experience.
Not much to do in a gallery without accessing your storage
File name must not be empty
Folder name must not be empty
More simple apps and source code at:\nhttp://simplemobiletools.com
Send your feedback or suggestions to:

string.name: rate_us_underlined
string.u: Rate us in the Play Store

resources.string: Same sorting for files and folders
